means: 地理学上，在地理上，地理方面

entry.def: Geographical or geographic means concerned with or relating to geography.

example.ex: Its geographical location stimulated overseas mercantile enterprise.
example.tran: 它的地理位置引起了海外商家的兴趣。

sentences.sentence: "they are geographically closer to the center of town"
